attributes.action: change vehicle excise duty to make it more proportional to the area occupied by the vehicle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vehicles (other than commercials) should be taxed according to space occupied on the road, to favour smaller, shorter, narrower and lighter vehicles.
This would not only encourage reduction of emissions since smaller vehicles permit smaller engines, but use of smaller vehicles would also reduce congestion, ease parking, reduce damage to road surfaces, kerbs and rural verges, improve visibility, and generally encourage more considerate and safer driving habits.
